entries.description: Remove support for 2019.3, 2020.1 is the new minimum version
Add copy Logical/Physical ID actions to Stack View #2165
Add SQS AWS Explorer node and the ability to send/poll for messages
Add the ability to search CloudWatch Logs using CloudWatch Logs Insights
Add copy actions to CloudFormation outputs (#2179)
Support for the 2020.3 family of IDEs
Add an AWS Explorer ECR node
Significantly speed up loading the list of S3 buckets (#2174)
